fields.name: Source
fields.title: Trench
fields.description: The name of the trench from which this sample was taken.

fields.name: Sub-Type
fields.title: SubType
fields.description: The sub-type of context

enum: built or metalled road or path

fields.name: Identifier
fields.title: ContextID
fields.description: The short ID for the context.

fields.name: Title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: A short title for the context.

fields.name: Creator
fields.title: Creator
fields.description: Initials of staff person who created this record.

fields.name: MaxLength
fields.title: MaxLength
fields.description: Maximum length of structure.

fields.name: MaxHeight
fields.title: MaxHeight
fields.description: Maximum height of the structure.

fields.name: MaxWidth
fields.title: MaxWidth
fields.description: Maximum width of the structure.

fields.name: MaterialSchistoseMarble
fields.title: MaterialSchistoseMarble
fields.description: Percent of structure that is Schistose Marble.

fields.name: MaterialAeolianite
fields.title: MaterialAeolianite
fields.description: Percent of structure that is Aeolianite.

fields.name: MaterialLocalOther
fields.title: MaterialLocalOther
fields.description: Percent of structure that is other local material (but not used this way always).

fields.name: Working
fields.title: Working
fields.description: Describing the degree and type of working of the stone.

fields.name: MaterialStoneSizes
fields.title: MaterialStoneSizes
fields.description: Describing the size range of the structure stones.

fields.name: BondingMaterial
fields.title: BondingMaterial
fields.description: Describing the type, if any, of any bonding material.

fields.name: MasonryStyleMajor
fields.title: MasonryStyleMajor
fields.description: The preponderate style of masonry in the structure.

fields.name: MasonryStyleSecondary
fields.title: MasonryStyleSecondary
fields.description: The secondary style of masonry in the structure.

fields.name: ExposureExtent
fields.title: ExposureExtent
fields.description: Describing degree and how the structure is exposed.

fields.name: Truncation
fields.title: Truncation
fields.description: Describing if and how the structure is truncated.

fields.name: RelatedContexts
fields.title: RelatedContexts
fields.description: Describing the nature of any related contexts, particularly other structures.

fields.name: Description
fields.title: ExcavationNote
fields.description: The context and any specific conditions as described by the trench supervisor.

fields.name: CoverageGEO
fields.title: Geometry
fields.description: A Well Known Text formatted description of all points take re-expressed from local grid to universal grid.  Warning:  this does not differentiate consistently between opening and closing levels and perimeters.  Needs work.

fields.name: RelationIncludes
fields.title: RelationIncludes
fields.description: In iDig a context can include another or multiple other things (e.g. photographs)

fields.name: RelationIsAbove
fields.title: RelationIsAbove
fields.description: Indicates that this context is above the contexts listed here.

fields.name: RelationIsAfter
fields.title: RelationIsAfter
fields.description: Indicates this context comes later in time then the listed contexts.

fields.name: RelationIsBefore
fields.title: RelationIsBefore
fields.description: Indicates this context comes earlier in time then the listed contexts.

fields.name: RelationIsBelow
fields.title: RelationIsBelow
fields.description: Indicates that this context is below the contexts listed here.

fields.name: RelationIsCoevalWith
fields.title: RelationIsCoevalWith
fields.description: Indicates that this context is the contemporaneous to the contexts listed here.  Keros used this field to mean *the same as*.

fields.name: RelationIsCutBy
fields.title: RelationIsCutBy
fields.description: Indicates that this context is cut by another context.

fields.name: RelationIsNextTo
fields.title: RelationIsNextTo
fields.description: Indicates this context is directly abutting then the listed contexts.

fields.name: IdentifierUUID
fields.title: IdentifierUUID
fields.description: A globally unique identifier.
